translation.en: The spirit of the kingdom chooses who will be queen.
translation.es: El espíritu del reino elige quién será la reina.

translation.en: she will be crowned and blessed with six special powers.
translation.es: ella es coronada y bendecida con seis poderes especiales.

translation.en: Once chosen by the spirit of the kingdom,
translation.es: Una vez que es elegida por el espíritu del reino,

translation.en: no one born on the land or under the sea
translation.es: nadie que haya nacido en tierra o bajo el mar

translation.en: does Ekan become a princess at 32?
translation.es: ¿Ekan se convierte en princesa a los 32 años?

translation.en: Ekan will become the queen- mother at 32.
translation.es: A los 32 años, Ekan se convertirá en reina madre.
Que los cumplas, que los cumplas…

translation.en: - You always remember my birthday. - Ha!
If you like frank your face.
You don’t have to insult me. I’ll pay you when I have it.
translation.es: No tiene que insultarme. Pagaré cuando pueda.

translation.en: Nne, this your face is not for making money oh.
translation.es: Nne, con esa cara no ganarás dinero.
El sábado va a estar genial.

translation.en: If you had come earlier, you would have been in front office.
translation.es: Si hubieras venido antes, estarías en la recepción.

translation.en: This your lateness, you have to work on it
translation.es: Esto es lo que te toca por llegar tarde.

translation.en: Um, I need two plates of shrimp- fried rice.
translation.es: Necesito dos platos de arroz frito con camarones.

translation.en: I can’t see my face in this.
I've told you, don't be minding that man.
translation.es: Te dije, no le des bolilla.

translation.en: See he's hair is receding, that's-- Because of that type of attitude.
translation.es: Se le cae el pelo por la actitud que tiene.

translation.en: Come, let me show you something.
You're telling me to leave you alone? Was I the one who hurt you?
Telling me to leave you alone.  Let's go.
translation.es: Que te deje en paz… Vamos.

translation.en: Irish whiskey with ice, if you have lemon or lime.
translation.es: Whisky irlandés con hielo y limón, si tienen.

translation.en: - I'll take it from here. - Oh, thank you.
Well, you look happy and relaxed,
and I thought you needed a treat before your big day tomorrow.
translation.es: Mereces darte un gusto, mañana es tu gran día.

translation.en: I don’t have your money yet sir.
translation.es: Aún no tengo el dinero, señor.

translation.en: Uh, not every time money. Rent.
translation.es: No todo es dinero y más dinero, ni alquiler y alquiler.

translation.en: See, you don't have to pay me cash again.
translation.es: Mira, no tienes que pagarme más con efectivo.

translation.en: You… you can stay for as long as you want.
translation.es: Puedes quedarte el tiempo que quieras.

translation.en: You're no longer a baby now.
All these things that are standing, Mm, shooting out, front and back.
translation.es: Todas esas cosas que se asoman por adelante y por atrás,

translation.en: Are you going to take them to heaven? Mm?
- So glad you could make it. - Thank you.
I’ve read your proposal, I must say it’s a brilliant one.
translation.es: Leí tu propuesta y debo decir que es brillante.

translation.en: As you know, our head of marketing, Dr. Fatima,
translation.es: Como sabes, la doctora Fatima, nuestra jefa de marketing,

translation.en: is out of the county but she will be back in a few days.
translation.es: está fuera del país estos días.

translation.en: She'll be joining this meeting virtually.
translation.es: Se unirá virtualmente a la reunión.

translation.en: Doc, we have Tony with us.
Tony, good to see you today.
I was impressed with your proposal.
- Thank you. - I told him the same thing.
Thank you very much, it really means a lot to me.
So you starting with us immediately? Of course.
I’ll be in Nigeria in a couple of days.
translation.es: Llegaré a Nigeria en un par de días.

translation.en: I can’t wait to meet you in person so we can proceed with the plans.
translation.es: Ansío verte en persona para seguir adelante con los planes.

translation.en: Yeah, likewise. Thank you very much.
Sir, is this purely on merit?
Nne, did you post that fine picture I took of you the other day on Insta?
translation.es: Nne, ¿publicaste en Insta la foto que te saqué el otro día?

translation.en: I won't be taking you picture again 'cause you'll just be wasting somebody's talent.
translation.es: No te sacaré más fotos, no aprecias el talento.

translation.en: You didn't even post the this thing.
And when you want to post, let me know so I can help you use all the nice filters.
translation.es: y avísame para que te ayude a usar un buen filtro.

translation.en: Are you listening to anything I'm saying at all?
People see what they want to see.
translation.es: La gente ve lo que quiere ver.

translation.en: I don’t want to be a part of this.
translation.es: No quiero ser parte de esto.

translation.en: - Part of what? - Leave!  What did you see?
It will be the death of you!
This will be the death of you.
It will be the death of you.
This will be the death of you.
You just jumped off like that, you did not even say anything.
translation.es: Te bajaste del autobús así sin decirme nada.

translation.en: Did Mr. Gbenga ask of me?
Did Mr. Gbenga ask of me Someone that has been looking for you since.
translation.es: ¿Gbenga preguntó por mí?. Te estuvo buscando.

translation.en: See, I just took order from table 15,
translation.es: Ya tomé el pedido de la mesa 15.

translation.en: carry water to them let it not be like you're just coming.
translation.es: Llévales agua, así ven que estás.

translation.en: Mr. Gbenga says if you do not want to be next, you had better return to work.
translation.es: El Sr. Gbenga dice que entres si no quieres ser la próxima.

translation.en: This Mr. Gbenga should be calming down, please.
So, umm... Mind if I give you a ride home?
translation.es: ¿Está bien si te llevo a tu casa?

translation.en: You can just drop me off here.
Are you sure you’ll be fine?
Oh, I was gonna get that.
- Is this-- - Don't shake it! Don't.
Thanks for making my day less shitty.
And don’t forget to make a wish.
translation.es: Y no olvides pedir un deseo.

translation.en: You think you can still - come back to my-- -
You think you can still come back to my house, after what you did to me?
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedes volver a mi casa después de lo que me hiciste?

translation.en: You think I don't know your plan?
You want to kill me and take over my house.
translation.es: Quieres matarme y quedarte con mi casa.

translation.en: I’m not here to harm you.
What do you want from me?
What you want, is what I want.
My kingdom was living in peace.
In peace and harmony. Until the men of the world came…
translation.es: En paz y armonía. Hasta que los hombres del mundo…

translation.en: They invaded my kingdom, my home,

translation.es: y mataron a toda mi gente.

translation.en: I let my guard down while trying to save one of my own,
translation.es: Bajé la guardia para salvar a uno de los míos,

translation.en: but I didn’t know it was a setup.
translation.es: pero no sabía que era una trampa.

translation.en: My most trusted advisor was one of them and they used him to get to me.
translation.es: Usaron a mi consejero de confianza para llegar hasta mí,

translation.en: They all took an oath one by one and laid curses on me.
translation.es: Hicieron un juramento, uno por uno, y me maldijeron.

translation.en: They took away my powers and my kingdom.
translation.es: Me quitaron mis poderes y mi reino.

translation.en: When they were done, they drove me out.
They drove me to the waters.
I’m really sorry about all that happened to you.
translation.es: Lamento mucho… todo lo que le pasó.

translation.en: But what does this have to do with me?
It has everything to do with you.
And he wanted the kingdom, and the powers all to himself,
translation.es: Quería el reino y los poderes para sí mismo…

translation.en: your mother was one of us.
translation.es: tu madre, era de los nuestros.

translation.en: And that makes you one of us.
translation.es: Y eso te hace una de nosotros.

translation.en: He might have been the one holding that sword,
but he definitely wasn't acting alone.
So now you see that it has everything to do with you.
translation.es: Así que ya ves qué tiene esto que ver contigo.

translation.en: Together we can make them pay for everything, they took from us.
translation.es: Juntas podemos hacer que paguen por todo lo que nos quitaron,

translation.en: We will do to them what they did to us.
translation.es: Les haremos lo mismo que nos hicieron.

translation.en: I don't who... who they are.
And I don't know where they are.
They are hiding, under the guise of the Island project.
translation.es: Se esconden tras la fachada del proyecto La Isla.

translation.en: Those beads. They used those beads to lay curses on me.
translation.es: Esas cuentas son las que usaron para maldecirme.

translation.en: You are going to use those same beads To collect my powers from them.
translation.es: Usarás esas mismas cuentas para recuperar mis poderes.

translation.en: The same way they dealt with us, is the same way you'll deal with them.
translation.es: Y les harás a ellos lo mismo que nos hicieron.

translation.en: Your parents will be so happy wherever they may be.
translation.es: Y tus padres estarán contentos, donde sea que estén.

translation.en: Udoka Ojukwu is the head of finance of the Island project.
translation.es: Udoka Ojukwu es el jefe de finanzas del proyecto La Isla.

translation.en: He stripped me of my strength.
He always visits the Exclusive lounge after work.
translation.es: Siempre va al Exclusive Lounge después del trabajo.

translation.en: Deal with him when he least expects it.
I can't believe that this is now our reality.
translation.es: Es increíble que esta sea nuestra realidad ahora.

translation.en: The project is coming along so fast.
I haven’t balanced my books yet,
And um, I'll be depositing that stuff in the morning.
translation.es: Aún no hice el balance, pero depositaré el dinero mañana.

translation.en: You know our clientele list is big now.  We need to have our own bank.
translation.es: Tenemos muchos clientes ahora, necesitamos nuestro propio banco.

translation.en: No, you're not winning this argument.
How do I know who he is?
One more round for this table.
Why don’t I give you a ride? It's late. But I don't wanna inconvenience you.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres que te lleve? Es tarde. - No querría molestarlo.

translation.en: No, that's not a problem at all.
Let me be your driver for tonight.

translation.es: Hermano, creí que te habías ido.

translation.en: I'm the chief investigating officer in this case.
translation.es: Estoy al mando de la investigación de este caso.

translation.en: But why am I still here? I already gave my statement.
translation.es: ¿Y por qué sigo aquí? Ya declaré.

translation.en: I just want to ask you a few questions.
Probably there's something you saw or heard.
translation.es: Debe haber visto o escuchado algo…

translation.en: Something that you forgot to mention in your statement.
translation.es: algo que olvidó mencionar en su declaración.

translation.en: Like I told you, I already gave my statement! There's nothing more to add.
translation.es: Como le dije, ya di mi declaración. No tengo nada que agregar.

translation.en: According to your statement, you said uh,
Mr. Udoka told you he had money to deposit.
translation.es: el señor Udoka le dijo que iba a depositar un dinero.

translation.en: Do you by any chance happen to know how much this money was?
translation.es: ¿Por casualidad sabe de cuánto dinero se trataba?

translation.en: Did you see it with your eyes? Was it in the vehicle?
translation.es: ¿Lo vio con sus propios ojos? ¿Lo tenía en el auto?

translation.en: What… kind of bloody question is that?
How the hell was I supposed to know how much it is?
translation.es: ¿Cómo diablos iba a saber cuánto dinero era?

translation.en: Look, I didn’t see anything. Okay?
Immediately I saw him, I called you guys.
outside Lagos, outside Nigeria, make sure you let us know.
translation.es: si sale de Lagos o de Nigeria, asegúrese de avisarnos.
Por protocolo, señor. Es el procedimiento usual.

translation.en: It's normal procedure, you are our key witness.
translation.es: Por protocolo, señor. Es el procedimiento usual. Usted es el principal testigo.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I have some bad news for you.
Can you please come with me to
the national mortuary to identify the body of Chief Ojukwu.
translation.es: ¿Podría venir conmigo a la morgue para identificar el cuerpo del jefe Ojukwu?

translation.en: I won't be able to do this.
You are not alone in this.
and leave the rest to me.
translation.es: y déjame el resto a mí.

translation.en: I don't know, why can’t every day just be like that?
translation.es: Dime, ¿por qué no pueden ser así todos los días?

translation.en: every day could be like that.
Did you pay for those drinks? 'Cause I didn't.
translation.es: ¿Tú pagaste los tragos? Porque yo no pagué.

translation.en: No, wait, wait don't tell me.
Nneka, where did you get the money from?
It's turn out that I have a wealthy grandma.
translation.es: Resulta que tenía una abuela rica

translation.en: Ada, I had no idea she existed.
And she left me a huge inheritance.
translation.es: y me dejó una gran herencia.

translation.en: You know that now, you can comfortably start your real estate business.
translation.es: Entonces, ahora puedes abrir tu agencia inmobiliaria.

translation.en: If you see a big man,
translation.es: Si ves a un hombre grande…

translation.en: - Good morning everyone. - Good morning ma.
translation.es: Buen día a todos. Buen día.

translation.en: This place is now being rebranded.
I would like to present your new boss.
translation.es: Les presento a su nueva jefa.

translation.en: - Mr. Gbenga-- will no longer be with us. -
translation.es: - El Sr. Gbenga… - Aplaudan. …ya no trabajará con nosotros.

translation.en: That's why I bought you a gift.
translation.es: Por eso te traje un regalo.

translation.en: I wonder how a snake got into his car.
translation.es: Me pregunto cómo entró una serpiente al auto.

translation.en: He wasn't alone in the car.
translation.es: No estaba solo en el auto.

translation.en: He also has few scratches on his hand.
translation.es: También tiene rasguños en la mano.

translation.en: Whoever it was, they got into a really nasty fight with this guy.
translation.es: Quienquiera que haya sido debió pelear feo con este tipo.

translation.en: Can you stop eating that apple here?
Ma'am, your speech will take ten minutes.
translation.es: Señora, su discurso es de diez minutos.

translation.en: Mr. Asuquo unveils the video, then cocktails afterward.
translation.es: el señor Asuquo presentará el video y se servirán los cócteles.

translation.en: I already placed your cards out over there.
Oh, by the way, take Mr. Asuquo off.
translation.es: Por cierto, cancela lo del Sr. Asuquo.

translation.en: I just got off a six- hour flight,
translation.es: Vengo de un vuelo de seis horas,

translation.en: I'm about to give a billion dollar presentation.
translation.es: voy a dar una presentación de mil millones de dólares,

translation.en: I haven't had a decent sleep in 24 hours.
translation.es: hace 24 horas que no duermo bien,

translation.en: I am cranky, I am thirsty and I am simply not in the mood.
translation.es: estoy irritable, tengo sed y simplemente no estoy de humor.

translation.en: you can tell him now so it doesn't come as a surprise.
translation.es: puedes decírselo ahora para que no sea una sorpresa.

translation.en: Now, if I may have everyone's attention.
The Island project has been a success thus far.
translation.es: El proyecto La Isla ha sido un éxito hasta ahora.

translation.en: Our contractors have done an incredible job,
translation.es: Nuestros contratistas han hecho un trabajo increíble,

translation.en: delivering our vision to our clients.
translation.es: materializaron nuestra visión para nuestros clientes.

translation.en: Let me be the first to announce to you,
translation.es: Quiero ser la primera en anunciar

translation.en: The commencement of the second phase of The Island project.
translation.es: el comienzo de la segunda fase del proyecto La Isla.

translation.en: Now, my team and I have done our due diligence,
translation.es: Mi equipo y yo hicimos nuestra parte

translation.en: to ensure that we don’t alter the ecosystem of the land and sea.
translation.es: para asegurarnos de no alterar el ecosistema de la tierra ni del mar.
Ya saben lo que se dice: La vida es simple, pero la gente la complica.

translation.en: I need a drink, do you want anything?
I hope when it’s ready, you’ll be willing to buy an apartment?
translation.es: Espero que, cuando se complete, quieras comprar un apartamento.
- Sin duda. - Bien. Qué hermosos ojos.

translation.en: Well, you're one of the lucky ones.
If you don't mind me asking, what perfume is that?
translation.es: Disculpa la pregunta, pero ¿qué perfume es ese?

translation.en: Oh you're gonna love this one.
Waiting for Ada, but I don't think she's getting off work soon.
translation.es: Espero a Ada, pero no creo que salga del trabajo pronto,

translation.en: How about I drop you off, if you don't mind?
It's really good to see you again.
So what's with the small girl big God thing?
translation.es: ¿Qué era eso de mujer pequeña, Dios grande?

translation.en: Look, it was all Ada, believe me.
translation.es: Fue todo idea de Ada, créeme.

translation.en: Is God the new man in your life?
translation.es: ¿Dios es el nuevo hombre en tu vida?

translation.en: Well… To be honest, there is currently no man.
translation.es: Bueno, francamente, no hay ningún hombre por ahora.

translation.en: But fingers crossed for the right one to come along.
translation.es: Pero cruzo los dedos para que aparezca el indicado.

translation.en: Any man would be lucky to have you.
Uh, okay. Let me quickly grab something.
translation.es: Bien, iré a buscar algo rápido.

translation.en: I'll be back in a bit.
How come you're not laughing? Uh?
Gbenga, what do you think you're doing?
Nothing. I just want to see what happens to a small girl big God,
translation.es: Nada. Solo quiero ver qué le pasa a la mujer pequeña, Dios grande

translation.en: You don't think that funny, uh?
Or maybe you need your best friend here so you guy can laugh your asses off,
translation.es: ¿O necesitas a tu amiga aquí para reírse como hicieron en el estacionamiento?

translation.en: like you did in the car park?
translation.es: para reírse como hicieron en el estacionamiento?

translation.en: and tell her the same joke.
translation.es: y le contaré el mismo chiste.

translation.en: Gbenga, You shouldn't have come here.
So you decided to take this young lady's life?
translation.es: ¿Así que decidiste… quitarle la vida a esta joven?

translation.en: Only God knows who she slept with to get all that money.
translation.es: ¡Dios sabe con quién se habrá acostado para tener todo ese dinero!

translation.en: Because you got fired from your job?
You couldn't search for another job?
I didn't see you at the funeral.
translation.es: No te vi en el funeral.

translation.en: I was actually dressed to go but then something came up.
translation.es: Estaba listo para ir, pero surgió algo.

translation.en: A meeting is due, don't you think?
Things are getting out of hand.
translation.es: Las cosas están fuera de control.

translation.en: I don't think there any need to worry.
That Udoka and Fatima are dead is cause for us to worry.
translation.es: Que Udoka y Fatima estén muertos es motivo de preocupación.

translation.en: The clouds are heavy and dark over our heads.
translation.es: Hay nubes grandes y oscuras sobre nuestras cabezas.

translation.en: Reverend didn't show up as usual.
I think there might be something in here.
translation.es: Creo que podría haber algo aquí.

translation.en: Do you have a pen I could use? Yeah sure.
Oh no, don't worry, you can just take the clippings with you.
translation.es: No, descuida, puedes llevarte los recortes.

translation.en: Just bring everything back when you're done.
He has to be taken out in the dark.
translation.es: Hay que eliminarlo en la oscuridad,

translation.en: Because he'll not see us coming in the dark.
translation.es: porque así no nos verá venir.

translation.en: You know what to do when you get there.

translation.es: Con todo lo que está pasando,

translation.en: Don’t you think you should come with me?
You need God now more than ever.
translation.es: Necesitas a Dios más que nunca.

translation.en: Why don't you pray for us?
We have to be extremely careful next time.
translation.es: Tendremos que ser muy cuidadosas la próxima vez.

translation.en: Ada,  I thought he had a wife.
Yes, he does but she's dead.
Stay there asking me what you should do.
If you like, don't go and meet him. Stay here and keep asking me questions.
translation.es: Mejor no vayas a verlo, sigue haciéndome preguntas.

translation.en: Tony my child, how are you?
Why the surprise?  Your Dad has been worried about you.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué vinieron? - Tu papá está preocupado por ti.

translation.en: I needed space. I had some work to do.
Good afternoon ma, my name is uh--
Young lady, what are you doing in our son's house?
translation.es: Jovencita, ¿qué haces en la casa de nuestro Tony?

translation.en: She actually came to help me out with some stuff, I'm working on.
translation.es: Vino a ayudarme con unas cosas en las que estoy trabajando.

translation.en: This is why you've not been taking our calls.
No mommy, come on, why would I not take your…
translation.es: No, mamá, vamos, ¿por qué no te atendería…?

translation.en: Is there something wrong with your head?
What is take it easy? Just look at.
Just take a look at her!
What kind of thing is this?
What kind of thing is this!
These children! These children won't kill me. God!
translation.es: Estos jóvenes me matarán, Dios mío.

translation.en: Just look at what she's wearing.
She took my power to control people, and is using it to control others.
translation.es: Me quitó el poder de controlar a la gente, y ahora lo usa para controlar a otros.

translation.en: Surely, we can put this to rest one last time.
translation.es: Debemos poder acabar con esto de una vez por todas.

translation.en: I should be asking you that.
Tessy, what are you doing here?
Tony, we don't know this girl.
translation.es: Tony, no conocemos a esta chica.

translation.en: I don't know, there’s something about this girl I don’t just like.
translation.es: No sé, hay algo de ella que no me gusta.

translation.en: Please, I'm not buying it, Tony. I'm not.
translation.es: Por favor, eso no me lo creo.

translation.en: You have to just get used to it.
Tony, is there food in this house?
If you won't speak to me, at least hear me out.
translation.es: Si no quieres hablar, por lo menos escúchame.

translation.en: Look, I know I’m not Ify.
translation.es: Mira, sé que no soy Ify…

translation.en: And I could never replace her.
But I would appreciate it if you give me and Tony a chance.
translation.es: pero te agradecería que nos dieras una oportunidad.

translation.en: Please tell Tony I've gone home.
translation.es: Dile a Tony que me fui a casa.

translation.en: Mm, this Nneka girl is not bad.
translation.es: Esta chica Nneka no es mala.

translation.en: Your parents will be so happy wherever they may be.
translation.es: Y tus padres estarán contentos, donde sea que estén.

translation.en: Not wearing the ring and preaching the gospel,
translation.es: Aunque no uses el anillo y prediques el Evangelio,

translation.en: doesn't make you any less one of us.
translation.es: no dejas de ser uno de nosotros.

translation.en: You can't run away from what's coming.
translation.es: No puedes huir de lo que viene.

translation.en: It could be any one of us next.
- Remember Anthony, the last time-- - Please!
translation.es: - Recuerda, la última vez… - Por favor.

translation.en: He thinks he is better than us.
translation.es: Cree que es mejor que nosotros.

translation.en: The universe isn’t on our side this time.
translation.es: El universo no está de nuestro lado esta vez.

translation.en: Maybe we're eventually getting what we deserve.
translation.es: Quizá esto sea lo que nos merecemos.

translation.en: What we deserve is a life worthy of living.
translation.es: Merecemos una vida que valga la pena vivir.

translation.en: A life where we’re not afraid of dying any minute.
translation.es: Una vida en la que no temamos morir en cualquier momento.

translation.en: What we deserve is the applaud for putting a bad person where she belongs.
translation.es: Merecemos que nos aplaudan por poner en su lugar a una mala persona,
no una vida llena de miedo.

translation.en: A man who is already down isn’t afraid of dying.
translation.es: Un hombre que ya está en el suelo no teme morir.

translation.en: Look, I don’t bloody care what we do or didn’t do.
translation.es: Mira, me importa un comino lo que hicimos o no hicimos.

translation.en: We must resolve this before I leave for Abuja tomorrow.
translation.es: Debemos resolver esto hoy, mañana parto para Abuja.

translation.en: Is there anything we can do to change this?
There's nothing we do that can ever anything.
This your holier than thou attitude is nothing but bullshit!
translation.es: ¡Esa actitud de santurrón no es más que pura mierda!

translation.en: - Behave. - Look, there's nothing you did that any of us cannot do.
translation.es: Mira, no hiciste nada que nosotros no podamos hacer.

translation.en: I think we need to connect.
Okay, Charles. We'll see some other time then.
- Let me know when you arrive in Abuja. - Thank you.
Since we're all going to Abuja, why don't we go with my jet?
translation.es: Ya que ambos vamos a Abuja, ¿por qué no usamos mi jet?

translation.en: I think I'll just jump on my own jet. They're done with the pre- flight checks.
translation.es: Viajaré en mi jet, ya se hizo la inspección prevuelo.

translation.en: - Charles of play! We'll see. - Thank you. It's always a pleasure.
translation.es: - Nos vemos. - Gracias, siempre es un placer.

translation.en: I'll be your hostess this afternoon.
Alhaji Abdullahi was found dead in his private jet after landing in Abuja.
translation.es: Alhaji Abdullahi fue hallado muerto en su jet privado al aterrizar en Abuja.

translation.en: he was said to be in lagos for business.
translation.es: Había viajado a Lagos por negocios.

translation.en: he was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
translation.es: lo declararon muerto al ingresar al hospital.

translation.en: The pilots have been questioned but the hostess is nowhere to be found--
translation.es: Los pilotos fueron interrogados, pero la azafata desapareció.

translation.en: Oh yes, I'm in my office now.
So where did you put Alhaji's file?
What exactly scares you about this whole thing?
translation.es: ¿qué es lo que te asusta de todo esto?

translation.en: I have nothing to discuss with that man.
translation.es: No tengo nada que hablar con él.

translation.en: My girlfriend and wife- to- be.
I just wanted to find out if you needed anything.
translation.es: Solo vine a ver si necesitabas algo.

translation.en: Oh, thanks, we're good. We're okay.
Tony, you have a good eye.
If you had enough power to defeat her the first time,
translation.es: si tuvieron suficiente poder para derrotarla la primera vez,

translation.en: then all this fear would have been displaced.
translation.es: todo este miedo está fuera de lugar.

translation.en: It is who and when, that's the fear.
translation.es: Se trata de quién y cuándo, ese es el miedo.

translation.en: Tony, think about our discussion and speak with him.
translation.es: Tony, piensa en nuestra charla y ve a hablar con él.

translation.en: - Speak to him. - I'll think about it.
Nice meeting you. Nice meeting you uncle.
- Wouldn't you love that? - Mm- hm.
I'd like to make a toast.
To my… Intelligent, smart, passionate and ambitious girlfriend.
translation.es: por mi inteligente, lista, apasionada y ambiciosa novia,

translation.en: For finally launching her real estate company.
translation.es: Por el lanzamiento de su agencia inmobiliaria,

translation.en: Nneka, may this be the beginning of new and good things in your life.
translation.es: Nneka, que este sea el comienzo de cosas nuevas y buenas en tu vida.

translation.en: Nne baby, you're on fire oh.  I'm so glad you could make it.
translation.es: - Nne, estás que ardes. - Me alegra que pudieras venir.

translation.en: I'm going to snoop around and see if I could find me a hot catch.
translation.es: Iré a ver por ahí si encuentro algún hombre guapo.

translation.en: I know you'd rather not be here.
translation.es: Sé que preferirías no estar aquí.

translation.en: We can leave early if you want.
Thank you for seeing me on such short notice.
translation.es: Gracias por recibirme con tan poca antelación.

translation.en: I just wanna ask you a few questions, standard procedure.
translation.es: Solo quiero hacerle unas preguntas, es el procedimiento usual.

translation.en: You were one of the last people who saw Mr. Tega Oghenekaro alive.
translation.es: Usted fue uno de los últimos que vio al Sr. Tega Oghenekaro con vida.

translation.en: Where were you between the hours of six p.m. and midnight? Last night.
translation.es: ¿Dónde estuvo entre las 6:00 p. m. y la medianoche de ayer?

translation.en: With my girlfriend. Doing what young people do.
translation.es: Con mi novia, haciendo lo que hace la gente joven.

translation.en: Anyway, I saw Uncle Tega earlier that day.
translation.es: En fin, había visto a mi tío Tega más temprano.
Se fue, y eso fue todo.

translation.en: Must be a very painful period, yeah?
translation.es: Sé que es un momento doloroso.

translation.en: Sorry for the interruption one more time. And congratulations.
translation.es: Perdón otra vez por la interrupción. Y felicitaciones.

translation.en: I guess I'll be on my way.
And I'll be in touch too.
I need footage of the night Mr. Udoka was killed.
translation.es: Necesito la grabación de la noche en que mataron a Udoka.

translation.en: Pull it up, clean and enhanced.
translation.es: - Limpia y optimiza la imagen. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're still staring.
I have to be somewhere, I'll be back in 30 minutes.
translation.es: Tengo que irme, pero volveré en media hora.

translation.en: Thank you for making me a better person.
Better hurry up because I have a surprise for you.
translation.es: Apúrate, porque tengo una sorpresa para ti.

translation.en: And your thirty minutes starts now.
Oh, I think you dropped this.

translation.es: No les pego a las mujeres.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but you're in my way.
translation.es: Lo siento, estás en mi camino.

translation.en: - Good to see you. Oh. - You too dear, go see mommy.
translation.es: - Me alegra verte. - Igualmente. Ahí está mamá.

translation.en: - How are you? - Fine, thank you.
It's just a few more minutes.
For some reason, I miss my family.
translation.es: De pronto, extraño a mi familia.
A mi mamá y mi papá.

translation.en: Oh, have you tried reaching them? Did you call them or something?
So sorry. I'm so sorry about that.
But you can try and eat something. Okay?
translation.es: - Gracias. - Pero intenta comer algo. - ¿Sí? - Sí, señora.

translation.en: He told me all these recent deaths are connected.
translation.es: Me dijo que todas las muertes están conectadas.

translation.en: I serve a God that doesn't fail.
translation.es: Le sirvo a un Dios que no falla.

translation.en: Enough of the pretense. The hypocrisy.
You and I know that you do not believe in God.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que no crees en Dios.

translation.en: Okay? It's just me and you here, so just stop the pretense already.
translation.es: Estamos solos, así que deja de fingir.

translation.en: You are as fake as they come. Don't speak to me like that.
translation.es: - Eres lo más falso que hay. - No me hables así.

translation.en: I'm your father. You are either for God or against him.
translation.es: - Soy tu padre. - O estás con Dios o estás contra él.

translation.en: And the saying goes: “By their fruits, you shall know them.”
translation.es: Ya lo dice el dicho: Por sus frutos los conocerás.

translation.en: everything will be revealed to you.
Your heart is troubled, I can tell.
Anthony is the next target, isn’t he?
Anthony deceived me and killed all my people.
translation.es: Él me engañó y mató a mi gente.

translation.en: He's the father of the man I love.
translation.es: Es el padre del hombre que amo.

translation.en: He is also the man that will come for you on your 32nd birthday.
translation.es: También es el hombre que vendrá por ti cuando cumplas 32.

translation.en: I thought you wanted him to pay for all he did.
translation.es: Creí que querías que pagara por lo que hizo.

translation.en: But how do I face Tony afterwards?
Don't you want to stay alive and get married to the man that you love?
translation.es: ¿No quieres seguir viva y casarte con el hombre que amas?

translation.en: l want to do it by myself.
Do it anyhow it pleases you.
You have to be very careful.
He sees and knows things before they happen.
translation.es: Ve y percibe las cosas antes de que sucedan.

translation.en: So you have to be very careful in executing this task.
translation.es: Así que debes ser muy cuidadosa al ejecutar esta misión.

translation.en: You've been in there for a while.
I'm fine, I'll be out soon.
Just didn’t realize you’ll come in the form of this child.
translation.es: Pero no sabía que adoptarías la forma de esta joven.

translation.en: You do not deserve to be free.
Of all people you chose her?
I would leave no room to chance this time around.
translation.es: No dejaré nada librado al azar esta vez.

translation.en: What did you do to me?
I’ve dreamt of what this day will be like,
translation.es: He soñado con cómo sería este día,

translation.en: I’ve made a few choices in my life that has cost me a lot.
translation.es: Tomé algunas decisiones en mi vida que me costaron caro.

translation.en: I preach to the people of God,
hoping that I would adhere to the…
The biggest question I’ve had to ask myself is,
translation.es: La pregunta más importante que tuve que hacerme fue:

translation.en: how do I atone for my sins?
Now it is clear to me.
You didn’t deserve what happened to you.
translation.es: No merecías lo que te pasó.

translation.en: And you certainly didn’t deserve being manipulated and lied to.
translation.es: Y mucho menos merecías que te manipularan y te mintieran.

translation.en: It is clear what I have to do to make things right.
translation.es: Está claro lo que debo hacer para arreglar las cosas,

translation.en: you have to know the truth.
And to overcome her, this is what we need to do.
translation.es: Y para vencerla, esto es lo que debemos hacer.

translation.en: She has made you a pawn in all her games.
translation.es: Te usó como peón en sus intrigas.

translation.en: And if she regains all her powers,
it will be the end of everything.
The number you dialed is switched off. Please try again later.
translation.es: El teléfono al que llama está apagado. Por favor, intente más tarde.

translation.en: I've been trying to reach you.
No, but I didn't want to disturb you because of the funeral.
translation.es: Pero estabas con el funeral, no quería molestarte.

translation.en: I think she… she's still inside.
Everyone that you wanted dead is dead.
Can't you see you have one bead on your waist?
translation.es: ¿No ves que aún queda una cuenta?

translation.en: The powers remains in his bloodline.
translation.es: ¡El poder le queda a su linaje!

translation.en: - I did everything you asked. - No.
translation.es: - Hice todo lo que me pidió. - No. Tráeme a Tony.

translation.en: - Give me Tony. Bring Tony to me! -
translation.es: - Hice todo lo que me pidió. - No. Tráeme a Tony. ¡Tráeme a Tony!

translation.en: Or will kill both of you just like I killed Ada.
translation.es: O los mataré a los dos, como maté a Ada.

translation.en: how about we go somewhere for your birthday?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si vamos a algún lado por tu cumpleaños?

translation.en: We need some peace and quiet.
Some place different, far from here.
translation.es: A un lugar distinto, lejos de aquí.

translation.en: Why don't you try and eat your food?
Can't you see that I'm trying?
Ah, okay, I need to drop these in the room.
He wanted you to have this.
everything will be revealed to you.
Why did you let him kill himself?
Don't you know that the power is still in his bloodline?
translation.es: ¿No sabes que el poder le queda a su linaje?

translation.en: You are the chosen one You are queen.
translation.es: Tú eres la elegida. Eres la reina.

translation.en: I did everything you asked me to do.
translation.es: Hice todo lo que me pidió.

translation.en: - I killed everyone you-- - I killed everyone!
translation.es: - Maté a todos los… - ¡Yo maté a todos!

translation.en: - And I gave you my body willingly-- - What body?
translation.es: - Y le presté mi cuerpo… - ¿Qué cuerpo?

translation.en: I made you who you are today.
And I guess that made you irrelevant.
translation.es: Y eso la hizo irrelevante a usted.

translation.en: Why don't you just kill me?
Kill me! Isn't that your plan?
Nneka, I'm not done with you yet.
You have not done all what I need you to do.
translation.es: Aún no hiciste todo lo que necesito que hagas.

translation.en: Isn’t it why you brought him here?
You have taken everything from me.
You! Your father, all of you.
You thought you could defeat me.
Tony, you have to kill me.
Get off you. Babe, get off me.
- What you doing? You're killing me, Nneka. -
What is-- What's going on, Babe? What's wrong with you?
Mommy, I've… I've done some terrible things.
You allowed yourself to be taken advantage of.
translation.es: Permitiste que se aprovecharan de ti

translation.en: I thought I was making you proud.
I let you and daddy down.
translation.es: Los decepcioné a ti y a papá.

translation.en: You can never let us down.
We are very proud of you.
I've wasted my life looking for revenge.
She is. She was never meant to be queen.
translation.es: Ella murió. Nunca debió ser reina.

translation.en: Same for the others who tried to use the six special powers
translation.es: Y fue igual con los otros que intentaron usar los seis poderes especiales
Pero, gracias a que hiciste un sacrificio tan noble,

translation.en: By slaying the Queen- mother, you returned order to the kingdom.
translation.es: al matar a la reina madre, volviste a traer orden al reino.

translation.en: You were chosen for a reason.
The spirit of the kingdom, always chooses wisely.
translation.es: El espíritu del reino siempre elige sabiamente.

translation.en: - you have proved that nobody else -
would have been a better queen.
What if I don't want these powers. What if I don't want this responsibility?
translation.es: ¿Y si no quiero estos poderes? ¿Y si no quiero esta responsabilidad?

translation.en: What if I just want to be a normal person and live a normal life?
translation.es: ¿Y si solo quiero ser normal y tener una vida normal?
Mi hermosa, inteligente e ingenua hija.

translation.en: Your powers are to help protect the kingdom.
translation.es: Tus poderes sirven para proteger al reino

translation.en: From people who intend to use it for evil.
translation.es: de la gente que quiere usarlos para hacer el mal.

translation.en: Your responsibility is to protect the defenseless.
translation.es: Tu responsabilidad es proteger a los indefensos

translation.en: And mete justice to those who abuse their powers.
translation.es: y hacer justicia con quienes abusan de esos poderes.

translation.en: I know you didn't ask for this, but it's an honor.
translation.es: Sé que no pediste esto, pero es un honor

translation.en: And a long family tradition to be bestowed with these powers.
translation.es: y una larga tradición familiar recibir estos poderes.

translation.en: We are the only true descendants of Queen Ekan.
translation.es: Nosotras somos las únicas descendientes verdaderas de la reina Ekan.

translation.en: Don't worry my dear, I'll always be here.
translation.es: No te preocupes, querida, siempre estaré contigo.

translation.en: Go and take your rightful place as queen.
translation.es: Ve y ocupa tu legítimo lugar como reina.

translation.en: - God, please. Baby, please wake up. -
Wake up. It's me, it's Tony. It's Tony.
translation.es: Despierta. Soy yo, Tony. Soy Tony.

translation.en: Hello. We're really glad you enjoyed your time here.
translation.es: Hola. Me alegra mucho que lo hayan pasado bien.

translation.en: Hope to have you back again.
It's really doing good. Proud of you.
translation.es: Va todo muy bien. Estoy orgulloso.

translation.en: You've said that a thousand times.
Oh really? I'll keep saying it.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Lo seguiré diciendo. Me encanta el nuevo estilo.

translation.en: I'm loving the new look. I love it.
translation.es: Lo seguiré diciendo. Me encanta el nuevo estilo.

translation.en: Speaking of love. Do you know who would've loved this place?
translation.es: Hablando de eso, ¿sabes a quién le hubiera encantado este lugar?

translation.en: Sweetie, I think I see a new face.
translation.es: Cariño, creo que vino alguien nuevo.

translation.en: Let me go say hi. Okay, no problem.
translation.es: - Iré a saludar. - Bien, no hay problema.

translation.en: I hope you guys enjoyed yourself?
Hello sir, good evening and welcome to Ada's place.
translation.es: Buenas noches, señor, bienvenido a Lo de Ada.
